variants.description: When you play a card on an opponent's turn, play a 1 [Might] Recruit unit token in your base.
variants.flavorText: "Join the glorious evolution"

variants.name: Viktor, Innovator
variants.description: When you play a card on an opponent's turn, play a 1 [Might] Recruit unit token in your base.
variants.flavorText: "Join the glorious evolution."

variants.name: Wraith of Echoes
variants.description: The first time a friendly unit dies each turn, draw 1.
variants.flavorText: His friends are with him in spirit.

variants.name: Ahri, Inquisitive
variants.description: When I attack or defend, give an enemy unit here -2 [Might] this turn, to a minimum of 1 [Might].
variants.flavorText: "The hunter and the hunted."

variants.name: Ahri, Inquisitive
variants.description: When I attack or defend, give an enemy unit here -2 [Might] this turn, to a minimum of 1 [Might].
variants.flavorText: "The hunter and the hunted."

variants.name: Seal of Insight
variants.description: [Tap]: [REACTION] - [ADD] [Mind]. (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)

variants.name: Teemo, Strategist
variants.description:
[Hidden] (Hide now for [power] to react with later for [0].)

When I defend or I'm played from [Hidden], reveal the top 5 cards of your Main Deck. Deal 1 to an enemy unit here for each card with [Hidden], then recycle them.

variants.name: Teemo, Strategist
variants.description:
[Hidden] (Hide now for [power] to react with later for [0].)

When I defend or I'm played from [Hidden], reveal the top 5 cards of your Main Deck. Deal 1 to an enemy unit here for each card with [Hidden], then recycle them.

variants.name: Time Warp
variants.description: Take a turn after this one. Banish this.
variants.flavorText:
"Fool me once... and I'll just rewind."
- Ekko

variants.name: Unchecked Power
variants.description: Exhaust all friendly units, then deal 12 to all units at battlefields.
variants.flavorText: That's enough.

variants.name: Arena Bar
variants.description: [Tap]: Buff an exhausted friendly unit. (if it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 [Might] buff.)
variants.flavorText: "This one's on the house!"

variants.name: Bilgewater Bully
variants.description: While I'm buffed, I have [GANKING]. (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
variants.flavorText: Places to go, people to gank.

variants.name: Cannon Barrage
variants.description:
[Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)

Deal 2 to all enemy units in combat.
variants.flavorText: If you've got enough guns, you don't need to aim.

variants.name: Challenge
variants.description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Choose a friendly unit and an enemy unit. They deal damage equal to their Mights to each other.
variants.flavorText: "He started it when he hit me back!"

variants.name: Confront
variants.description:
[Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)

Units you play this turn enter ready.
Draw 1.
variants.flavorText: Now is the only moment that matters.

variants.name: Crackshot Corsair
variants.description: When I attack, deal 1 to an enemy unit here.
variants.flavorText: "Ahoy."

variants.name: Dune Drake
variants.description: When I attack, give me +2 [Might] if there is a ready enemy unit here.
variants.flavorText: Dragons hunt not just for food, but for the thrill of it.

variants.name: First Mate
variants.description: When you play me, ready another unit.
variants.flavorText: "it's a boarding party! Try to have some fun with it."

variants.name: Flurry of Blades
variants.description:
[Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)

Deal 1 to all units at battlefields.
variants.flavorText:
"Violence solves everything."
-Katarina

variants.name: Mobilize
variants.description: Channel 1 rune exhausted. If you can't, draw 1.
variants.flavorText: The sound of the trumpets is the first blow struck in battle.

variants.name: Pakaa Cub
variants.description: [Hidden] (Hide now for [Rune] to react with later for [0].)
variants.flavorText:
"Oh it's so cute!"
-Common last words

variants.name: Pit Rookie
variants.description: When you play me, buff another friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets +1 [might] buff.)
variants.flavorText: "Is that all you got?"

variants.name: Stormclaw Ursine
variants.description:
[TANK] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)
When you play me, channel 1 rune exhausted.
variants.flavorText:
"The Ursine speak for man, and the wild responds." 
-Volibear

variants.name: Catalyst of Aeons
variants.description: Channel 2 runes exhausted. If you couldn't channel 2 runes this way, draw 1.
variants.flavorText: Ages of strife, crystallized into eternity.

variants.name: Cithria of Cloudfield
variants.description: When you play another unit, buff me. (If I don't have a buff, I get a +1 [Might] buff.)
variants.flavorText: Every story starts small.

variants.name: Herald of Scales
variants.description: Your Dragons' Energy costs are reduced by [2], to a minimum of [1].
variants.flavorText: The language of dragons is a magic of its own.

variants.name: Kinkou Monk
variants.description: When you play me, buff two other friendly units. (Each one that doesn't have a buff gets a +1 [Might] buff.)
variants.flavorText: A master teaches the same lesson again and again, and learns something new each time.

variants.name: Mountain Drake
variants.flavorText: After centuries spent trying to understand dragon behavior, researchers can agree on one thing: If you're seeing that behavior up close ... run.

variants.name: Pirate's Haven
variants.description: When you ready a friendly unit, give it +1 [Might] this turn.
variants.flavorText: It's the best place in the world, until you run out of coin.

variants.name: Spoils of War
variants.description:
[Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
If an enemy unit has died this turn, this costs [2] less.
Draw 2.
variants.flavorText: Waste nothing.

variants.name: Unyielding Spirit
variants.description:
[Reaction] (Play at any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Prevent all spell and ability damage this turn.
variants.flavorText: Battles are won in the heart before they are won on the field.

variants.name: Wallop
variants.description:
[Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
As you play this, you may spend a buff as an additional cost. If you do, ignore this spell's cost. Ready a unit.
variants.flavorText: If smashing doesn't work, just keep smashing.

variants.name: Wildclaw Shaman
variants.description: When you play me, you may spend a buff to buff me and ready me. (If I don't have a buff, I get a +1 [Might] buff.)
variants.flavorText: To channel nature's fury, a shaman must endure it.

variants.name: Anivia, Primal
variants.description: When I attack, deal 3 to all enemy units here.
variants.flavorText: "Do not tempt the blizzard."

variants.name: Carnivorous Snapvine
variants.description: When you play me, choose an enemy unit at a battlefield. We deal damage equal to our Mights to each other.
variants.flavorText: Gardening is usually a very relaxing hobby.

variants.name: Kraken Hunter
variants.description:
[Accelerate] (You may pay [1] [body] as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)
[Assault] (+1 [might] while i'm an attacker.)

As you play me, you may spend any number of buffs as an additional cost. Reduce my cost by [body] for each buff you spend.

variants.name: Lee Sin, Centered
variants.description:
[Accelerate] (You may pay [1][Body] as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)
Other buffed friendly units at my battlefield have +2 [Might].
variants.flavorText: "Today will be a worthy test."

variants.name: Lee Sin, Centered
variants.description:
[Accelerate] (You may pay [1][Body] as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)
Other buffed friendly units at my battlefield have +2 [Might].
variants.flavorText: "Today will be a worthy test."

variants.name: Mistfall
variants.description: When you buff a friendly unit, you may pay [Body] and exhaust this to ready it.
variants.flavorText: Thousands of thwarted dreams, ready to be lifted anew.

variants.name: Overt Operation
variants.description:
[Action] (play on your turn or in showdowns.)

For each friendly unit, you may spend its buff to ready it. Then buff all friendly units. (Each one that doesn't have a buff gets a +1 [might] buff.)
variants.flavorText: "We can go deep undercover, sneak in through the back, and end this quietly. Or...."

variants.name: Primal Strength
variants.description:
[Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Give a unit +7 [Might] this turn.
variants.flavorText: There is savagery inside us all.

variants.name: Qiyana, Victorious
variants.description:
[Deflect] (Opponents must pay [power] to choose me with a spell or ability.)
When I conquer, draw 1 or channel 1 rune exhausted.
variants.flavorText: "Line them up. I will bend their knees."

variants.name: Sabotage
variants.description: Choose an opponent. They reveal their hand. Choose a non-unit card from it, and recycle that card.
variants.flavorText: Sometimes it takes dirty tricks to ensure a fair fight.

variants.name: Udyr, Wildman
variants.description:
Spend my buff: Choose one you've not chosen turn --

Deal 2 to a unit at a battlefield.
Stun a unit at a battlefield
Ready me.
Give me [GANKING] this turn.

variants.name: Volibear, Imposing
variants.description:
[SHIELD 3] (+3 [Might] while I'm a defender.)
[TANK] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)
When an opponent moves to a battlefield other than mine, draw 1. (Bases are not battlefields.)
variants.flavorText: "Gods do not beg. We take what is ours!"

variants.name: Volibear, Imposing
variants.description:
[SHIELD 3] (+3 [Might] while I'm a defender.)
[TANK] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)
When an opponent moves to a battlefield other than mine, draw 1. (Bases are not battlefields.)
variants.flavorText: "Gods do not beg. We take what is ours!"

variants.name: Warwick, Hunter
variants.description:
I enter ready.
When I attack, kill all damaged enemy units here.
variants.flavorText: "The blood you spilled calls to me."

variants.name: Dazzling Aurora
variants.description: At the end of your turn, reveal cards from the top of your Main Deck until you reveal a unit. Play it, ignoring its cost, and recycle the rest.
variants.flavorText: The omens offer much to those who dare to see them.

variants.name: Deadbloom Predator
variants.description:
[DEFLECT] (Opponents must play [Rune] to choose me with a spell or effect.)

You may play me to an occupied enemy battlefield.
variants.flavorText: The souls of those who died unfulfilled coalesce into a form to sate those hungers.

variants.name: Miss Fortune, Captain
variants.description:
[ACCELERATE] (You may pay [1] [Body] as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)
[GANKING] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
The first time I move each turn, you may ready something else that's exhausted.
variants.flavorText: "Set sail!

variants.name: Miss Fortune, Captain
variants.description:
[ACCELERATE] (You may pay [1] [Body] as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)
[GANKING] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
The first time I move each turn, you may ready something else that's exhausted.
variants.flavorText: "Set sail!

variants.name: Seal of Strength
variants.description: [Tap]: [REACTION] - [ADD] [Body]. (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)

variants.name: Sett, Brawler
variants.description:
When I'm played and when I conquer, buff me. (If I don't have a buff, I get a +1 [Might] buff.)
Spend my buff: Give me +4 [Might] this turn.
variants.flavorText: "Momma always said I had her temper."

variants.name: Sett, Brawler
variants.description:
When I'm played and when I conquer, buff me. (If I don't have a buff, I get a +1 [Might] buff.)
Spend my buff: Give me +4 [Might] this turn.
variants.flavorText: "Momma always said I had her temper."

variants.name: Cemetery Attendant
variants.description: When you play me, return a unit from your trash to your hand.
variants.flavorText: "Good boy! Now, where's the rest of 'em?"

variants.name: Ember Monk
variants.description: When you play a card from [hidden], give me +2 [might] this turn.
variants.flavorText: A flame bright enough to cast many shadows.

variants.name: Fight or Flight
variants.description:
[Hidden] (Hide now for [Rune] to react with later for [0].)
[Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Move a unit from a battlefield to its base.
variants.flavorText: "Boo."

variants.name: Gust
variants.description:
[REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Return a unit at a battlefield with 3 [Might] or less to its owner's hand.

variants.name: Morbid Return
variants.description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Return a unit from your trash to your hand.
variants.flavorText:
"Soon, this long cruel night will end. But not yet."
-Viego

variants.name: Mystic Poro
variants.description: [Vision] (When you play me, look at the top card of your Main Deck. You may recycle it.)
variants.flavorText: Forecast: Sunny, with a chance of snax.

variants.name: Rebuke
variants.description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Return a unit at a battlefield to its owner's hand.
variants.flavorText: "Get out."

variants.name: Ride the Wind
variants.description:
[Action] (play on your turn or in showdowns.) 

Move a friendly unit and ready it.
variants.flavorText: "Follow the wind, but watch your back." -Yasuo

variants.name: Sai Scout
variants.description:
[VISION] (When you play me, look at the top card of your Main Deck. You may recycle it.)
You may play me to an open battlefield.
variants.flavorText: "Ours for the taking!"

variants.name: Shipyard Skulker
variants.flavorText: Few people laughed when she claimed she was a "dock pirate" - or at least, few remained.

variants.name: Sneaky Deckhand
variants.description: You may play me to an open battlefield.
variants.flavorText:
"I like to think of her as a pre-boarding party."
-Miss Fortune

variants.name: Stealthy Pursuer
variants.description: When a friendly unit moves from my location, I may be moved with it.
variants.flavorText: "Anywhere you can go, I can go better."

variants.name: Undercover Agent
variants.description: [DEATHKNELL] - Discard 2, then draw 2. (When I die, get the effect.)
variants.flavorText: Even he no longer knew which side he worked for.

variants.name: Acceptable Losses
variants.description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Each player kills one of their gear.
variants.flavorText: "Never liked that sword anyway."

variants.name: Fading Memories
variants.description: Give a unit at a battlefield or a gear [temporary]. (Kill it at the start of its controller's Beginning Phase, before.)
variants.flavorText: You too shall pass.

variants.name: Pack of Wonders
variants.description: [Tap]: Return another friendly gear, unit, or [HIDDEN] card to its owner's hand.
variants.flavorText:
"I know I put it in here somewhere...." 
-Teemo

variants.name: Scrapheap
variants.description: When this is played, discarded, or killed, draw 1.
variants.flavorText: The parts that make it to the heap are the ones that DIDN'T blow up.

variants.name: Stacked Deck
variants.description:
[Action] (play on your turn or in showdowns.) 
Look at the top 3 cards of your Main Deck. Put 1 into your hand and recycle the rest.
variants.flavorText: "Just lucky, I guess."

variants.name: The Syren
variants.description: [1], [tap]: Move a friendly unit at a battlefield to your base.
variants.flavorText: Without a ship, a pirate's just another common criminal.

variants.name: Traveling Merchant
variants.description: When I move, discard 1, then draw 1.
variants.flavorText: Payment first, refund never.

variants.name: Treasure Trove
variants.description: When this leaves the board, draw 1 and channel 1 rune exhausted.
variants.flavorText: "We're gonna be rich!" -Common Last Words

variants.name: Whirlwind
variants.description: Starting with the next player, each player may return a unit to its owner's hand.
variants.flavorText:
"The storm approaches." 
-Janna

variants.name: Zaunite Bouncer
variants.description: When you play me, return another unit at a battlefield to its owner's hand.
variants.flavorText: If he had things his way, NOBODY would get in.

variants.name: Kayn, Unleashed
variants.description:
[GANKING] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
If I have moved twice this turn, I don't take damage.
variants.flavorText: "I will survive eternity. They will die today."

variants.name: Kog'Maw, Caustic
variants.description: [Deathknell] - Deal 4 to all units at my battlefield. (When I die, get the effect)
variants.flavorText: "Oblivion come."

variants.name: Maddened Marauder
variants.description:
[TANK] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)
When you play me, move a unit from a battlefield to its base.
variants.flavorText: They know no fear. Nor much of anything else, really.

variants.name: Mindsplitter
variants.description: When you play me, choose an opponent. They reveal their hand. Choose a card from it, and they discard that card.
variants.flavorText: Its victims go mad deciding which half to run from first.

variants.name: Miss Fortune, Buccaneer
variants.description:
You may play me to an open battlefield.
Friendly units may be played to open battlefields.
variants.flavorText: "I always shoot first."

variants.name: Miss Fortune, Buccaneer
variants.description:
You may play me to an open battlefield.
Friendly units may be played to open battlefields.
variants.flavorText: "I always shoot first."

variants.name: Nocturne, Horrifying
variants.description: [Ganking] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.) When you look at cards from the top of your deck (and don't draw them) and see me, you may play me for [power].

variants.name: Rhasa the Sunderer
variants.description: I cost [1] less for each card in your trash.
variants.flavorText: It feeds well on death, but better on madness.

variants.name: Soulgorger
variants.description: When you play me, you may play a unit from your trash, ignoring its Energy cost.

variants.name: Teemo, Scout
variants.description:
[HIDDEN] (Hide now for [Rune] to react with later for [0].)
When you play me, give me +3 [Might] this turn.
variants.flavorText: "Reporting in!"

variants.name: Teemo, Scout
variants.description:
[HIDDEN] (Hide now for [Rune] to react with later for [0].)
When you play me, give me +3 [Might] this turn.
variants.flavorText: "Reporting in!"

variants.name: The Harrowing
variants.description: Play a unit from your trash, ignoring its Energy cost. (You must still pay its Power cost.)

variants.name: Tideturner
variants.description:
[hidden] (Hide now for [power] to react with later for [0].)

When you play me, you may choose a friendly unit. Move me to its location and it to my original location.

variants.name: Twisted Fate, Gambler
variants.description:
When I attack, reveal the top rune of your rune deck, then recycle it. Do one of the following based on its domain:
[Fury] - Deal 2 to an enemy unit here and 1 to all other enemy units here.
[Mind] - Draw 1.
[Order] - Stun an enemy unit.

variants.name: Invert Timelines
variants.description: Each player discards their hand, then draws 4.
variants.flavorText:
"Good a time as any to act reckless."
- Ekko

variants.name: Jinx, Rebel
variants.description: When you discard one or more cards, ready me and give me +1 [Might] this turn.
variants.flavorText: "Rules are made to be broken. Like buildings! Or people!"

variants.name: Jinx, Rebel
variants.description: When you discard one or more cards, ready me and give me +1 [Might] this turn.
variants.flavorText: "Rules are made to be broken. Like buildings! Or people!"

variants.name: Possession
variants.description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Choose an enemy unit at a battlefield. Take control of it and recall it. (Send it to your base. This isn't a move.)
variants.flavorText: Some have a change of heart. Others need you to change it for them.

variants.name: Seal of Discord
variants.description: [Tap]: [REACTION] - [ADD] [Chaos]. (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)

variants.name: Yasuo, Windrider
variants.description:
[GANKING] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
The third time I move in a turn, you score 1 point.
variants.flavorText: "I will follow this path until the end."

variants.name: Yasuo, Windrider
variants.description:
[GANKING] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
The third time I move in a turn, you score 1 point.
variants.flavorText: "I will follow this path until the end."

variants.name: Back to Back
variants.description:
[REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Give two friendly units each +2 [Might] this turn.
variants.flavorText: Fight together or die alone.

variants.name: Call to Glory
variants.description:
[REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
As you play this, you may spend a buff as an additional cost. If you do, ignore this spell's cost.
Give a unit +3 [Might] this turn.

variants.name: Cruel Patron
variants.description: As an additional cost to play me, kill a friendly unit.
variants.flavorText: Fealty is a duty, not a choice.

variants.name: Cull the Weak
variants.description: Each player kills one of their units.
variants.flavorText: What good is having a plank if nobody ever walks it?

variants.name: Daring Poro
variants.description: [ASSAULT] (+1 [Might] while I'm an attacker.)
variants.flavorText: Don't worry, they love it.

variants.name: Faithful Manufactor
variants.description: When you play me, play a 1 [Might] Recruit unit token here.
variants.flavorText: Hard work is its own reward.

variants.name: Forge of the Future
variants.description:
When you play this, play a 1 [might] Recruit unit token at your base.

Kill this: Recycle up to 4 cards from trashes.
variants.flavorText: "What do you make? Beats me, but we do it better than anyone else."

variants.name: Hidden Blade
variants.description:
[HIDDEN] (Hide now for [Rune] to react with later for [0].)
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Kill a unit at a battlefield. Its controller draws 2.
variants.flavorText: Not every Noxian decree is read aloud.

variants.name: Petty Officer
variants.description: [ASSAULT] (+1 [Might] while I'm an attacker.)
variants.flavorText: Cross him and you'll learn just how petty he can be.

variants.name: Soaring Scout
variants.description: [DEATHKNELL] - Channel 1 rune exhausted. (When I die, get the effect.)
variants.flavorText:
"Show us a path!" 
-Ashe

variants.name: Trifarian Gloryseeker
variants.description: [LEGION] When you play me, buff me. (If I don't have a buff, I get a +1 [Might] buff. Get the effect if you've played another card this turn.)
variants.flavorText: War demands your life but offers immortality.

variants.name: Vanguard Captain
variants.description: [LEGION] - When you play me, play two 1 [Might] Recruit unit token here. (Get the effect if you've played another card this turn.)
variants.flavorText: "Soldiers, to me!"

variants.name: Vanguard Sergeant
variants.flavorText: He knew his orders: hold the line, or there would be nothing left to hold.

variants.name: Facebreaker
variants.description:
[hidden] (Hide now for [power] to react with later for [0].)

[action] (play on your turn or in showdowns.)

Stun a friendly unit and an enemy unit at the same battlefield. (They don't deal combat damage this turn.)
variants.flavorText: "Play nice!" - Sett

variants.name: Imperial Decree
variants.description: [action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.) When any unit takes damage this turn, kill it.
variants.flavorText: "With a word, I end you." -Azir

variants.name: Noxian Drummer
variants.description: When I move to a battlefield, play a 1 [Might] Recruit unit token here. (It is also at the battlefield.)

variants.name: Peak Guardian
variants.description: When you play me, buff me. Then, if I am at a battlefield, buff all other friendly units there. (To buff a unit give it a +1 [might] if it doesn't already have one.)
variants.flavorText: Mount Targon's blessing is besowed upon those who have proven that they are strong enoguh without it.

variants.name: Salvage
variants.description:
[Action] (play on your turn or in showdowns.) 
You may kill a gear. Draw 1.
variants.flavorText: One person's treasure is another one's trash.

variants.name: Solari Chief
variants.description: When you play me, choose an enemy unit. If it is stunned, kill it. Otherwise, stun it. (it doesn't deal combat damage this turn.)
variants.flavorText: The sun has many rays, each tasked with driving out the darkness.

variants.name: Spectral Matron
variants.description: When you play me, you may play a unit costing no more than [3] and no more than [RUNE] from your trash, ignoring its cost.
variants.flavorText: "Come - there is use for you yet."

variants.name: Symbol of the Solari
variants.description: If a combat where you are the attacker ends in a tie, recall ALL units instead. (Send them to base. This isn't a move. Ties are calculated after combat damage is dealt.)
variants.flavorText: "Next time, try to leave a dent!" -Leona

variants.name: Vanguard Helm
variants.description: When a buffed friendly unit dies, buff another friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 [might] buff.)
variants.flavorText: Vanguard soldier share both a helm and a vision.

variants.name: Vengeance
variants.description: Kill a unit.
variants.flavorText: A brief moment of turmoil -- then peace.

variants.name: Albus Ferros
variants.description:
When you play me, spend any number of buffs.
For each buff spent, channel 1 rune exhausted.
variants.flavorText: In Piltover, the best way to become a great inventor is to find a great investor.

variants.name: Commander Ledros
variants.description:
As you play me, you may kill any number of friendly units as an additional cost. Reduce my cost by [Order] for each killed this way.
[Deflect] (Opponents must pay [Rune] to choose me with a spell or ability.)
